title: Stunning 2 bed 2 bath Near Grant Park! Includes Parking + 500Mb WIFI!
posting_body: ['Come take a look at this HUGE bright and spacious recently renovated modern condo!', 'Amazing views from every room.', 'Available Aug 1st 2022', 'Unique Features', "Rarely available and most sought after N/W corner 2 bed 2 bath in the Prairie District's premier building.", 'PRICE INCLUDES 500 MBPS HIGH-SPEED INTERNET AND ALL UTILITIES EXCEPT ELECTRICITY.', 'Washer + dryer in unit.', 'Indoor heated garage parking included.', 'Interior Highlights', 'Stunning panoramic views from every room!', 'FULLY RENOVATED!', 'Luxury high-end finishes include:', '- Modern kitchen with custom hand-crafted cabinets and Kitchen-Aid appliances', '- Silestone Quartz countertops in both the kitchen and bathrooms', '- High-end Kohler bathroom suites with heated floors in master bath and waterfall showers', '- Custom closets', '- UV blocking floor-to-ceiling windows', '- Herman Miller light fixtures', '- Wide plank hardwood oak floors throughout', '- 100 sqft foot outdoor private balcony with electricity and room for a gas or electric grill', 'Best Things About the Building', 'Adler Place offers access to the best of the South Loop, including Grant Park, Museum Campus and Soldier Field.', 'Catering to a uniquely refined and relaxed urban lifestyle well suited for cultural enthusiasts, nature lovers and sports fans alike.', 'This full amenity building features a 24h doorman and secured indoor parking, an entertainment suite on the 32nd floor that offers a full kitchen and access to an outdoor pool and grilling area, outdoor swimming pool and sundeck, his and her spa areas with hot tubs and sauna, fitness center, catering kitchen, outdoor cabana and sundeck.', 'Best Things About the Neighborhood', 'Less than 1mi away from Museum Campus, Grant Park, Lakefront, and Soldier Field.', 'Walk to world-class restaurants and entertainment.', 'Close to grocery stores and CTA, commute to Loop less than 20 minutes.']
